xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: ImportSheet
xwikidoc.content:
#** * This page allows to import application resources * @type sheet *#
#set($trans = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("L10NCode.L10NGroovy")) $trans.setContext($context, $xwiki) #if($request.url) #if($request.language) #set($language = $request.language) #else #set($language = "en") #end Page loaded: $trans.importApplicationResourcesFromURL($doc.web, "core", $language, $request.url) #end
